Warning



I teach three different sections of KIN 377, one hybrid and two fully online. Even though it shows in Canvas you are in section #19392, you still belong to the section you originally enrolled. To find out, log into the CSUN Portal and verify your original enrollment.
So, if the CSUN Portal says you are in 

KIN 377 MOTOR LEARNING - (19430-SP2023); or
KIN 377 MOTOR LEARNING - (19780-SP2023)

Then, THERE ARE NO ON-CAMPUS OR ONLINE MEETINGS. You are enrolled in a FULLY online (asynchronous) course.
And if the CSUN Portal says you are in

KIN 377 MOTOR LEARNING - (19392-SP2023)

Then, there will be online and on-campus meetings.
